website_summaries.verdict: Many people were appreciative of the Asics Gecko XT and what it has to offer. They welcomed this neutral trail shoe’s clean construction, its relatively lightweight nature, and its appealing design. Most of the testers were also happy with the cushioning system. But some had their concerns, particularly the narrow fit and the water-retaining interior chamber.
pros: The protective plate that’s placed between the midsole and outsole was esteemed by those who have tried the Asics Gecko XT
Some people thought that the design of this model was smooth and clean
Several consumers have considered the weight to be light and agreeable for long-running sessions
The vibrant color schemes gained positive feedback
The underfoot cushioning system was appreciated for being comfortable and responsive
cons: This running shoe didn’t shed water as well as other trail-specific options, some testers noted
Several consumers observed that the toe box was uncomfortably narrow and that the instep was too low
The external sole unit exuded an irritating squeaking noise when on smooth floors such as tiles, a couple of testers noted

customer_reviews.title: Size not accurate...too small
customer_reviews.text: I have probably purchased 20 pairs of ASICS running shoes over the years and have never had an issue with the fit regardless of the model. Right out of the box, the shoes fit perfectly and were comfortable from the first step. Not so with this model. It is narrower than I expected and the length was not consistent with othe models I have had. Unfortunately, my past experience led to me recycling the box before I had a chance to try them on so now I am unable to return them for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the better shoes I have ever purchased. It's great for walking on trails or just the local blacktop or concrete trails in my city. Very comfortable. As with all trail shoes from Asics you should probably buy a half size larger. They tend to be a little tighter but that is because they have anti gravel and are designed for off concrete use as well to prevent your heel from rolling.
customer_reviews.author: B-DUB

customer_reviews.title: Fit just right, features perfect for trail running.
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with ASICS, to me it’s the brand of running shoes that best fits my needs, I will be using my new Gecko XTs for the next upcoming Spartan Race here in Mexico, where I am expecting mud, water, dirt, rocks and cobble stones terrain, and I am sure the shoes will perform great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avid Asics Customer - these run small!
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews. I religiously wear Asics (Gel Kayano 11.5) as my primary running shoe, but was always a little disappointed by their trail running options. I was looking forward to trying these, but like other reviews state these run SMALL. I'm a consistent 11.5 in every pair of Asics I ever bought...can usually run with them right out of the box with zero issues. These felt like an entire size+ smaller than 11.5.....will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy K

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Initially a little snug, but material will break in and fit well. Bought because of issues with achilles tendon. Put in 2.1 miles with no pain. Going again tonight. So far so good. Always liked the Asics shoes. Cushion is great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron from KC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Locks on to your heel really good. I returned cause the didnt look as good in person for me.
customer_reviews.author: nzbc

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are really nice,got em for everyday use,not for running..I wouldnt recommend them for running,support is not enough..There are other ones for that..But overall for walking they are great,just dont forget to get one size up..I do that always to make sure they will be comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: Antony

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow. My normal size length was fine but this is not a D width (medium width) shoe. Very low instep and narrow toe box.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from the mud!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look! They run great. Have to admit though.....not as awesome as my last Asics, but they are still great! Asic really can't go wrong in my book. Won't ever buy any work out or running shoe other than Asics honestly. Plus they look sick! Just stay away from dirt. They can get dingy quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and are well built. These are trail shoes, they are meant to be a bit narrow and fit snug. I wore these in a 5 mile hike in the white mountains and they performed well. Wear a good sock with these, I earned a hell of a blister on my heel due to wearing a crap sock that slid down mid-hike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes made difference
customer_reviews.text: Have thoroughly enjoyed this shoe. Use them several days a week to cut grass professionally and they’ve made a difference with traction and ground covering speed. Not much arch support and oddly , NO heel cushion/support. But neither of these have made me think twice about wearing them to work. Majoritly happy with purchase , may possibly try another shoe in the future based on level of heel support.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Buy half size up
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. They are giving pretty good support on uneven terrain . They work well on hard surfaces. Just make sure to order half a size up, they run small. I did modify a little bit of color pattern of my shoes the way they look better to me. Can you find how?
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Not sure who these shows were designed for, but they seem way too narrow, a bit small, and almost no arch support. I should have paid more attention to the other reviews. I'll give these another day but they'll probably have to go back. I do like how they look, so 2 stars for that.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G. Picciano

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe just about perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 11.5 in this shoe but I wear a 11.5 with Nike and 11 with New Balance if that helps with size choice. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love how these babies look!!! I haven’t run in them yet, but they feel pretty comfy. The only issues I have are they seem to run a bit small. After reading some reviews, I ordered a half size larger, and they still seem slightly snug in the toe. I’m sure once they get broken in they’ll be fine. Other than that, the shoe strings feel kinda thin, but I’ll just replace them with some quality ones. They look great, tho!!
customer_reviews.author: muteassassin

customer_reviews.title: Good trail shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very good trail shoes. I ran into them about 60 km. And it’s good medium trail shoes. Very comfortable with a place to hide shoelaces. Recommended if you are asics fan :)
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Not typical Asics size
customer_reviews.text: After owning many many pairs of Asics over the years this is the first model that is sized different. I always wear a 10 but can't in this shoe. It is smaller in every area. Must send back.
customer_reviews.author: Presto

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Felt great from initial slide into the foot and first step in them. Look very nice, see pics. Good on long strided walking. Easy around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Amazing trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: My feet got fat and these took some breaking in, but I got them to fit a little small because I trust a tighter fitting shoe on the trails the most. If my feet aren't relaxed they might fall asleep a little, but the more I used them the better they felt. Highly recommendable. I trust them and they allow me to enjoy whatever activity I take them on all the more.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Charles Pilcher

customer_reviews.title: A tad tight and less support
customer_reviews.text: I’d agree that they run a bit more snug then other ASICS I own. The heal support of this shoe isn’t anywhere comparable to a gel if that’s what you’re used to. Overall, it’s a cheaper shoe but the tread is great for the trails and the aesthetics of the shoe are sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus R.

customer_reviews.title: No free refund
customer_reviews.text: The toe box was restrictive, and I'm out $5 on the return shipping. Bad idea to buy shoes with no free refunds.
customer_reviews.author: chrispriiice

customer_reviews.title: Seems Like a Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Normally when I buy Asic's they are spot on for fit. Not this one, this shoe is way to small and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jack T

customer_reviews.title: Asics Trail
customer_reviews.text: Normally get Asics FujiTrabuco, but Asics has now priced them out of my reach. The Gecko is a great, less expensive substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Crossword

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for running & cycling.
customer_reviews.text: The lace sock at the top of the tongue keeps the laces away from bike gears & helps to keep laces tied.
customer_reviews.author: Bob McGibeny

customer_reviews.title: Horrible miss sized
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Had to pay over $10.00 to return shoes that are unwearable due to the fact the sizing is wrong. DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.author: William F. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Asics needs a refresher on what constitutes a shoe size
customer_reviews.text: It would be a great shoe of the size was correct. I read the reviews and purchased a size larger than I normally go (my usual size is 10 but went up to an 11), but this still felt like an entire size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Stell

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Definitely run small. Started with a 12 which I could not even get on. Size 13 still snug. Depending on brand I usually wear a 12 or 13. Heel box is not very heavily padded resulting in blisters during break in period. Overall I like the look and feel of the shoe. Just wish fit was easier to dial in
customer_reviews.author: Dave McCaffrey

customer_reviews.title: Not a good shoe if you’re aiming for more minimal but cushion trail option.
customer_reviews.text: The show profile says 18:12 with 6mm drop. The shoes measure and feel more like 30:24.. very thick, narrow, and nothing like the light trail shoe I expected. The run true to size length wise, but narrow on toe box. Buying them was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Ranp

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Always wear a mens 11 these were so tight I had to return and pay the return shipping
customer_reviews.author: Mike Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than usual
customer_reviews.text: I've used for a week, and looks good, but are not comfortable and are too narrow
customer_reviews.author: alvaro m.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a great price
customer_reviews.text: As a runner for nearly fifty years, ASICS shoes continue to give me great support and excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn J. McLoughlin

customer_reviews.title: No worth buying
customer_reviews.text: If you need/want comfortable and reliable trail running shoes look elsewhere. These are impractical good looking shoes that is it.
customer_reviews.author: Sup yo!!

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers for any purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers for any purpose. Comfy and look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo A.

customer_reviews.title: Run 1/2 size small
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was great. Just make sure you order a half size up. Run small and narrow
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes , order one size up
customer_reviews.text: Looked over the recommendations of other buyers and chose 1 extra size up, it was a good decision as size is perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Yitzko

customer_reviews.title: Asics
customer_reviews.text: Always a fan of Asics. They always fit. Running trails and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Swane Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Bought them to address my supination. It's really helped my foot pain
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Unvericht

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Never had an issue with sizing and these shoes are not true to fit as they are a about size too small than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Wong size pay for express shipment receive 8 days

customer_reviews.title: Tight on heel
customer_reviews.text: The curve of the back of the shoe is to tight at first. I had blisters on the back of my ankle. They have been great since they are worn in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled size maybe?
customer_reviews.text: Cramped shoes that hurt my toes and the balls of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I recommend a good half size up or even a whole size up!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great! Fits like my other Nike’s in the same size. Very comfortable and the lace garage is a nice touch. Lugs are plenty for trail racing.
customer_reviews.author: Harr7171

customer_reviews.title: Hole in top mesh alread
customer_reviews.text: This shoe already has hole in top Not a expected quality from NB Expect a refund
customer_reviews.author: vicki joshpe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Toe box to small, toes rub the inside top of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Dean

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and light but strong and feel durable. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: I gave 3stars because the shoe kind of cheaply made ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3stars because the shoe kind of cheaply made I had to go half size up and kind of narrow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Asics Womens Gecko XT Shoes
product_meta.description: Stay strong even on the most challenging trails with the lightweight and responsive construction of the Gecko XT running shoe from ASICS®. Predecessor: N/A. Support Type: Underpronation to Neutral. Cushioning: Lightweight, flexible response. Surface: Road. Differential: 6mm. Heel/Toe: 18mm/12mm. Breathable mesh and synthetic upper. Constructed with a last that allows for more room in the toe box to keep the runner safe and supported even while trekking downhill. Seamless construction reduces the potential for irritation and friction caused by traditional stitches and seams. Gusseted, anti-gravel tongue prevents debris from entering the shoe. Padded collar for added comfort. Integrated Lace Garage™ Technology complies with rules regarding laces. Comfortable fabric lining offers a great in-shoe feel. Cushioned textile footbed for added comfort and support. Revolutionary FlyteFoam™ midsole creates a lightweight, responsive ride. Rock protection plate guards against stone bruises. Trail-specific rubber outsole with GeckoTrac™ technology provides high grip on various terrain without compromising durability. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 12 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Seamless Construction Reduces The Potential For Irritation And Friction
Integrated Lace Garage Technology; Anti Gravel Tongue; Rock Protection Plate
Asicsgrip Technology Provides High Grip On Various Terrain
Flytefoam Midsole Technology Provides Exceptional Bounce Back And Responsiveness No Matter The Distance
